text: Ondřej Palát (born 28 March 1991) is a Czech professional ice hockey winger. He is an alternate captain of the Tampa Bay Lightning of the National Hockey League (NHL). He was drafted in the seventh round, 208th overall, by the Lightning at the 2011 NHL Entry Draft. ==Other websites== * Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:Czech ice hockey players Category:Drummondville Voltigeurs players Category:Norfolk Admirals players Category:Syracuse Crunch players Category:Tampa Bay Lightning players
title: Ondřej Palát
